claim: You would find olives at a heladeria.

supporting.text: A heladeria is an ice cream shop, and olives are not a typical ingredient or topping for ice cream.

attacks.text: A heladeria is an ice cream shop, and olives are not a typical ingredient or topping for ice cream.
Some heladerias also serve savory snacks or tapas, which could include olives.
The primary focus of a heladeria is ice cream, and savory items like olives are extremely rare exceptions.

supporting.text: Olives are savory and commonly found in Mediterranean or grocery stores, not in dessert-focused establishments like heladerias.

attacks.text: Olives are savory and commonly found in Mediterranean or grocery stores, not in dessert-focused establishments like heladerias.
Some heladerias in Mediterranean regions may offer savory snacks like olives alongside desserts to cater to local tastes.
Even in Mediterranean regions, heladerias primarily focus on sweet items, making savory offerings like olives extremely rare.
Tourist-focused heladerias in Mediterranean areas sometimes include local specialties like olives to attract visitors.

supporting.text: Traditional heladerias focus on sweet flavors and fruits, not savory items like olives.

attacks.text: Traditional heladerias focus on sweet flavors and fruits, not savory items like olives.
Some modern heladerias have expanded their menus to include savory items like olives.
The claim specifies 'traditional heladerias', making modern expansions irrelevant.
Olives are sometimes used as garnishes in sweet dishes, which could be found in heladerias.
Garnishes are not typically considered main items, so olives would still be rare in heladerias.

supporting.text: Olives are not listed in standard menus or offerings of heladerias, which prioritize ice cream and related desserts.

attacks.text: Olives are not listed in standard menus or offerings of heladerias, which prioritize ice cream and related desserts.
Some heladerias in Mediterranean regions may offer olives as part of regional snacks or accompaniments.
Even in Mediterranean regions, heladerias primarily focus on desserts, making olives an exception rather than a standard offering.
Heladerias sometimes expand their menus to include savory items to attract a broader customer base.
Menu expansions in heladerias are rare and typically still center around sweet or dessert-like items.
